summary: An ordinance amending Section 7 of Ordinance No. 40697, entitled, "An ordinance relating to the Department of Public Utilities regulating the operation, and maintenance of the municipal street railway, creating and fixing the duties of, and compensation attached to, positions of employment in said department, abolishing certain other positions of employment, repealing all ordinances or parts thereof, in conflict herewith, and declaring an emergency," approved on March 22, 1920.
